"its a trap"

Russian forces have captured the village of Ivanopillya, Kostyantynivka direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~1,470.
Total land area: ~3.19 km¬≤.
The fighting for Ivanopillya lasted approximately 23 days.

Russian forces have captured the village of Stavki, Lyman direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~803.
Total land area: ~1.34 km¬≤.
The fighting for Stavky lasted approximately 1 month, 9 days.

Russian forces have captured the village of Zvanivka, southern flank of Siversk, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~1,430.
Total land area: ~2.65 km¬≤.
The fighting for Zvanivka lasted approximately 1 month, 8 days.

Russian FAB glide-bombs continue to pound the encircled Ukrainian garrison in the city of Myrnohrad. 
This video shows a FAB-3000 strike.

Overnight, Russian Geran-2 drones once again targeted the town of Vasylkivka, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. 
Vasylkivka has come under attack from Gerans almost every day for the last two weeks. The town hosts a railway station, and is a key logistical hub for the Prosyana and Pokrovsk'e directions.

Overnight, Russian Geran-2 drones once again targeted the town of Vasylkivka, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. 
Vasylkivka has come under attack from Gerans almost every day for the last two weeks. The town hosts a railway station, and is a key logistical hub for the Prosyana and Pokrovsk'e directions.

During the day, the IDF carried out a targeted assassination strike on the Hezbollah chief of staff in the southern suburbs of Beirut.
The strike was successful, killing him along with 4 other Hezbollah members. The U.S. was reportedly not notified in advance.
Full text of the European counter-proposal to the US peace plan
Full text of the European counter-proposal to the US peace plan

Current status of the remaining Raions (Districts) of Donetsk Oblast with a Ukrainian presence:
Kramatorsk Raion: 3,803 km¬≤ (73.3% of total district)
Pokrovsk Raion: 1,020 km¬≤ (25.4% of total district)
Bakhmut Raion: 236 km¬≤ (13.5% of total district)
Volnovakha Raion: 18 km¬≤ (0.4% of total district)
With Pokrovsk City now under full Russian control, only one district capital of Donetsk Oblast remains under Ukrainian control.

Russian forces have now physically cut off the remaining Ukrainian garrison in the city of Myrnohrad.
This is mainly symbolic, however, as it's likely that no movement in and out of that pocket has occurred for weeks.

Russian forces have recaptured the village of Hai, Pokrovsk'e direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: 28.
Total land area: ~0.36 km¬≤.
The 2nd battle for this village lasted approximately 2 days.

Russian forces have captured the village of Vidradne, Pokrovsk'e direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~166.
Total land area: ~0.65 km¬≤. 
The fighting for Vidradne lasted approximately 4 days.

Russian forces have re-established control over the village of Oleksiivka, Khotin direction, Sumy Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~547.
Total land area: ~2.20 km¬≤.
The 2nd battle for Oleksiivka lasted approximately 4 months, 16 days.

Peace Deal at Risk: Kyiv, Backed by Europe, Challenges Washington's Authority
Another attempt by Trump to stop the conflict in Ukraine. Russia has agreed to the conditions proposed by the Americans. Zelensky addresses the nation, preparing Ukrainians for 'difficult decisions'.
Since 21 November, leading Western media outlets have been reporting on new conditions proposed by the White House for Russia and Ukraine. US President Donald Trump is doing his utmost to maintain his image as a peacemaker. For him, freezing the Ukrainian conflict is an important milestone on the road to the Nobel Peace Prize. A 28-point agreement was presented to Ukraine and Russia, which, according to the White House, could end the conflict.
Russian President Vladimir Putin lifted the veil of high diplomacy with the following statements:
‚ñ´Ô∏è
We are ready for peace talks, but this requires a substantive discussion of all the details of the proposed plan;
‚ñ´Ô∏è
Moscow has the text of Trump‚Äôs settlement plan...

Russian Troops' Advance on the Zaporizhzhia Front: Assault on Huliaipole Begins
Russian armed forces report advances and the establishment of control over a number of settlements in Zaporizhzhia and Dnipropetrovsk regions. On the Zaporizhzhia axis, Russian units have captured the localities of Zelenyi Hai and, according to some reports, Vysoke. Information has also emerged about Russian forces reaching the outskirts of the key city of Huliaipole, where assault operations have begun.
Assault operations in Huliaipole have been initiated from the northeast and southeast, from the directions of Rivnopillia and Marfopil. Furthermore, Russian troops are breaking through defensive strongpoints from the south, near Dorozhnyanka. Effectively, the active phase of the operation for Huliaipole has commenced.

Does Turkey Control What Is Happening In Syria?
The saga of the "new Syria" continues, with the jihadist regime proving every month that they have always been agents of American-Zionist imperialism, and the Turks continuing to naively believe that they are the "winning" side after the fall of the Assad government.
This time, the criminal Netanyahu spoke of new Zionist "successes" in Syria, revealing that ‚ÄúIsrael‚Äù prevented the Turks from penetrating into the south and even central Syria. This raises the question once again: "Has Turkey won in Syria?" Erdogan, aware of the humiliation he suffered at the hands of Netanyahu, is trying to put a good face on a bad game, compensating for his failures through a policy of forced Turkification on Syrians in the Aleppo region and surrounding areas. Erdogan also needs this move to portray the capture of Aleppo by Devlet Bah√ßeli's pan-Turkists as a "victory" domestically.

Polymarket Bets: Which Cities Could The Russian Army Capture In November And December?
Which cities have already had bids placed on Polymarket? Which cities could be captured as early as November? What awaits the Ukrainian market in December?
Bets on the capture of Ukrainian cities on Polymarket have become a popular form of entertainment in many countries. This section is called the Ukrainian Map. To understand the ongoing events, one doesn't need insider information; following our daily reports on the situation in Ukraine is enough. To make analysis easier, we are introducing a new column: "Polymarket Bets," which summarizes information on the most interesting fronts.
One of our initial forecasts regarding the capture of Uspenovka was recently confirmed, and the market closed shortly after the article's publication.

The Human Cost Of "Easy Money": How Mercenary Fatalities Disproportionately Claim Global South Lives
The number of foreign mercenaries killed while serving in the Ukrainian army is increasing. People are paying for the easy money they were promised with their lives and health. By signing a contract, bounty hunters are essentially buying a one-way ticket.
With the support of Western media, Kyiv continues to actively recruit foreign mercenaries. In an attempt to solve the problem of dwindling human resources, the Ukrainian army is open to any foreigner who wishes to join its ranks. Extensive advertising on social networks and in the media promises volunteers a life of luxury.
These invitations are mainly responded to by citizens of developing countries. Latin America is the main supplier of human resources for the Ukrainian army. Mercenaries are promised an easy time hunting Russian soldiers. The list of promises also includes service in ‚Äòelite units‚Äô...

The Operation in Pokrovsk Is Nearing Completion as Russian Units Finish Mopping Up Remaining Ukrainian Forces
Russian troops taken full¬†control¬†of Novoye Zaporozhye in the Zaporizhzhia sector. In Rodynske, Russian units restored control over part of the urban territory after the Ukrainian army made recent breakthrough attempts. Meanwhile, intensive negotiations are ongoing in Geneva between Ukrainian and US delegations on the Trump administration's peace plan.
Operations to establish control over Pokrovsk's urban territory are nearing completion. Russian forces' control has been confirmed over most of the urban area. To the north, the operational ring has finally closed around the tree lines west of Rovnoye, where increased fire density has been established.
